panel.title: AD - Password Change Outside of Working Hours

search.query: `cs_wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (4624, 4768, 4769) src=* [| search `cs_wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (627, 628, 4723, 4724, 4794) | dedup ComputerName Subject_Account_Name | table ComputerName Subject_Account_Name | rename Subject_Account_Name as user] | bin span=1m _time | eval date_wday = strftime(_time, "%A"), date_hour = tonumber(strftime(_time, "%H")) | `cs_password_change_outside_working_hour_definition` | table _time ComputerName user src EventCode | rename user as Subject_Account_Name | append [| search `cs_wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (627, 628, 4723, 4724, 4794) | search $tkn_search_common|s$ $tkn_search_password_change_outside_working_hour|s$ | eval date_wday = strftime(_time, "%A"), date_hour = tonumber(strftime(_time, "%H")) | `cs_password_change_outside_working_hour_definition` ] | eventstats values(eval(if(in(EventCode, 4768, 4769), _time."###".src, null()))) as input by ComputerName, Subject_Account_Name | search EventCode IN (627, 628, 4723, 4724, 4794) | timestampbasedcorrelation lookback=300 lookahead=300 | table _time, Target_Account_Name, Subject_Account_Name, output, EventCode, msad_action, status, action, ComputerName, Target_Account_Domain, Subject_Account_Domain Caller_Workstation | rename Target_Account_Name as Target_User, Target_Account_Domain as Target_User_Domain, Subject_Account_Name as Actor, Subject_Account_Domain as Actor_User_Domain, output as "Probable Sources" | `cs_ad_password_change_outside_working_hour_filter`

html.p: Description: The weekend and any weekday before 6am and after 7pm are considered to be after/outside of working hours. The date and time can be adjusted to better accommodate your needs by changing the following macro definition (Settings > Configuration): cs_password_change_outside_working_hour_definition.
